channel.title: Garrys mod problem
channel.description:
Hello I've recently had stuttering and crashing problems in garrysmod whenever I spawn the Half-Life Source npc's, but when I spawn other npc's the game runs fine. Is it my PC or just bad coding? [specs on next line]
GPU: Asus Gtx 280 1GB *stock* CPU: Intel core i7 860 2.8GHZ *stock* Motherboard: Asus Maximus III Formula *stock* Power Supply: 1000 watt Thermaltake tough power XT RAM: Corsair Xms3 4gb ddr3 *stock* CPU Heatsink: Coolermaster V8
I'm starting to think it my just be a coding issue because when you gib the hl1 npcs four skulls come out and the blood is purple when you shoot them.

item.title: Garrys mod problem
item.dc:creator: Skilgannon
item.description:
I have searched and searched this topic, but have yet to find this fabled “Ramfirezoid” you speak of, coldroll. I believe you are either delusional and seeing people (or in this case, forum members) that aren’t there, in which case you should seek professional help before these people encourage you to pick up the knife and not stop stabbing before christmas, or you have merely mistyped Ramirezoid’s name and you will now suffer the wrath of his cold, cold rage. Sooner or later, not necessarily now.

Read full topic

item.title: Garrys mod problem
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
Sounds like you’re using Gibmod. Type Gibmod_rehook in the console if that skull shit happens. The purple blood is normal on HLS npcs AFAIK, I get it too.

As for crashing just for HLS npcs, try unmounting it and running GMOD without it. Then make sure HLS is installed and mount it again.

This happened to me last week, it was actually because of the map I was on. Make sure you’re on a grass/construct kind of map, not any of those fucked up ones with all the useless brushes and related miscellanea

Read full topic
